metadata.title: Forum Novelties Men's Matador Costume
features: Traditionally styled black and gold matador costume
Short jacket with shoulder pads and coordinating pants
Cape, hat, and leggings available separately from Forum
Men's standard size best fits men up to 42-inch chest size
Made by Forum Novelties, a leader in costumes and novelty products for more than 30 years
description: For more than 30 years, Forum Novelties has been a leader in the costume industry, as well as the joke, trick, magic, and novelty gift item business. Forum offers over 8,000 items to choose from, ranging from baby costumes, to adult and plus-size costumes, to pet costumes. Look to Forum Novelties for all of your Halloween, luau, Christmas, Mardi Gras, and St. Patrick's day supplies. From funny to frightening, Forum has it all.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 6 Pounds", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "January 17, 2014", "Manufacturer": "Forum Novelties Costumes"}
